description: Abdulkadir Masharipov is sentenced for killing 39 people in a nightclub on New Year's Day 2017.
title: Abdulkadir Masharipov: Turkish court jails man for life over Istanbul nightclub attack
title_page: Abdulkadir Masharipov: Turkish court jails man for life over Istanbul nightclub attack - BBC News
maintext: Masharipov had arrived at the club by taxi, before rushing through the entrance with an automatic rifle he had taken from the boot of the car.
